title: [Epidemiology] Researchers have developed a DNA test to quickly identify secondary infections in COVID-19 patients, who have double the risk of developing pneumonia while on ventilation than non-COVID-19 patients. The test uses multiple polymerase chain reaction, can be done in around four hours
[Health] COVID-19 vaccine creates an incentive to improve our health: Previous research suggests stress, depression and inactivity could interfere with our immune response to vaccination
